title: Convert Degrees to Direction
description: This function converts a given degree value to a corresponding cardinal direction based on additional input parameters. It considers a shift operation for performance and adapts the calculation depending on the value of 'N'. The output string represents the direction (e.g., North, East) derived from the degree input.
name: DEG_TO_DIR

input.name: DEG
input.description: The degree input to be converted to a direction.

input.name: N
input.description: An additional input variable that influences the calculation of the direction.

input.name: L
input.description: Length input that determines the language used for direction output.

output.name: DEG_TO_DIR
output.description: The resulting string that represents the direction based on the degree input.

return_value.description: Returns the direction corresponding to the given degree input.
